whatDoesItDo.title: What does it do?
whatDoesItDo.description: Our air quality sensor measures the concentration of PM in real time, along with complex parameters that contribute to indoor and outdoor air pollution. Our monitoring device is ideal for residential, commercial and commercial purposes.

technologySection.title: What technology is used?
technologySection.paragraph1: In order to provide innovative and productive quality products, our team of experts has been constantly working on how to reduce pollution using various pollution detection methods.
technologySection.paragraph2: Our main focus revolves around developing sensors that provide accurate, real-time pollution data. As we continue to explore our horizons in researching and developing new ways to benefit our customers needs, we are currently using technologies that include electrochemical, catalytic, optical (including NDIR and PID/metal oxide semiconductors) and spectroscopy.

altTexts.technologyImage: Technology sensors used in sensible air monitor

indoorAirPollutionSensors.title: Indoor Air Pollution Sensors
indoorAirPollutionSensors.description: Our Sensible Portable Air Quality Monitor comes with highly accurate sensors and provides accurate real-time AQI reading within seconds to understand indoor air quality (IAQ).

accuracyComparison.title: How Accurate is Sensible Monitor
accuracyComparison.description: Comparison of our Sensible Monitor with other high-cost pollution monitors in real-time.

comparison.title: Comparison
comparison.description: Prana Air Sensible Air Monitor measures real-time indoor air pollution level that helps you understand the quality of the air you breathe.

office.title: Office
office.description: Use the air quality monitor to know the indoor pollution level in the office and keep your employees safe from breathing polluted air particles.

hotel.title: Hotel
hotel.description: Many visitors come every day to stay a night at the hotel. It is important to make sure that the premise is a very clean environment and make comfort for the visitors.

school.title: School
school.description: Students are the future pillars of a nation. It is the duty of the authority to keep them safe and breathe clean air. The air quality monitor can help to understand the air quality level in school.

hospital.title: Hospital
hospital.description: This is one of the most important places where the authorities need to take care very seriously. Through a good air quality monitor, it will be easily understood air pollution levels.

factory.title: Factory
factory.description: Safety is the main priority in factories where the workers use very harmful machines and tools. There is a very high chance of high pollution level. With a pollution device, it is very easy to understand the level of air quality at the factory.

college.title: College & University
college.description: Educational institutes are the places where professors impart knowledge in many fields. Air pollution is also a field of study the professors teach to the students.
